data.title: Line Rapace: Who is Ola Rapace's daughter?
data.meta_description: Line Rapace is the daughter of Ola Rapace. Line Rapace's father is a Swedish actor who gained massive recognition for playing Patrice in the 2012 James
data.text:
Line Rapace is the daughter of Ola Rapace. Line Rapace’s father is a Swedish actor who gained massive recognition for playing Patrice in the 2012 James Bond film Skyfall. He is also known for films such as Rancid and Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets. In 2018, he was also one of the main antagonists in series 3 of Netflix/BBC’s popular Viking drama The Last Kingdom as “Jarl Sigurd Bloodhair”.

Line Rapace: Bio Summary

Line Rapace was born in 1999 in the United States of America. She is the daughter of Ola Rapace and Malin Morgan. As of 2023, she is 24 years old. She is not the only child of her father, she has a younger half-brother whose name is Lev Rapace. It is unclear if her parents were actually married but her father was married to Swedish actress Noomi Rapace in 2001.

Line Rapace’s mother is an actress

Line’s mother Malin Morgan is a Swedish actress. She is known for Slim Susie (2003), Livvagterne (2009), and Tjenare kungen (2005). It is unclear if they were married before the birth of Line, but Ola got married to What Happened to Monday Star, Noomi Rapace in 2001.

ALSO, READ; Lev Rapace: Who is Noomi Rapace’s son?

Upon marrying, Ola who was born Ola Norell, and Noomi who was born Noomi Norén decided to use the surname “Rapace”, meaning “bird of prey” both in French and Italian, because it sounded “cool”.

It is unclear what exactly happened between Line’s parents Ola Rapace and Malin Morgan as they have spoken much about their relationship in public. In May 2019 Line’s father tied the knot again with Sonja Jawo in Paris. She is the older sister of Aino Jawo, of the Swedish electropop duo Icona pop. They divorced in the summer of 2021.

Line’s father was arrested by the police

Line’s father was arrested in 2021 by police under suspicion of gross violation of women’s rights /Sexual misconduct/spousal abuse. However, prosecutors announced on September 13, 2022, that they were closing the investigation and the case was dismissed.

Where is Line Rapace now?

Though she is the daughter of a famous personality, she has been very private about her life. Unlike most celebrities’ kids who capitalize on their parents’ fame to also gain a spot in the limelight, Line seems to be avoiding it. She has not made any news or headlines in recent years.
